```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
#| warning: false
#| message: false

# this code uses the output from autocv to put together a list of publications

from autocv.researcher import Researcher
from autocv.markdown import MarkdownCV
import json
from datetime import date


autocv_params = json.load(open('settings.json'))
r = Researcher(autocv_params['paramfile'], format='md')
r.from_json(autocv_params['jsonfile'])

md = MarkdownCV(r)
md.render_md()

print(md.publications)

print(f'Updated: {date.today()} - Created using [autocv](https://github.com/poldrack/autoCV)')


```
